author: MrShibby
title: One of the top experiences of all my travel - Great Wall Tour with Downtown Backpackers
text: We signed up for the 10K Wild Great Wall hike from Jiankou to Mutianyu. This tour, while not for the timid (6 miles of fun!) was exactly how I wanted to experience the Great Wall. This is an experience that I would not trade. Jackie was a fantastic guide. Very helpful. Very patient for when we needed a quick break. If you are an adventurer - Do this with THESE people!
